title: Projects
text: This project developed an optimization model for a real estate company in Laurelton, Queens, to maximize profit by balancing commission rates, staffing, and operational costs within a fixed monthly budget. The model found that lowering the commission rate from 5% to 4.33% and avoiding new hires maximizes profit by increasing market penetration while controlling costs. This strategy remained optimal across various sales forecasts, with projected profits between approximately $585,000 and $742,000. The recommendation is to maintain a 4.33% commission rate and current staffing levels to ensure profitability and sustainable growth over the next two years.

title: Resume
text:
Ryan Martin - Curriculum Vitae



Chapel Hill, NC 27516 (919) 636-8693    ryanmarti1998@gmail.com www.linkedin.com/in/ryanalexandermartin


Profile


Highly motivated and detail-oriented mathematics graduate with a passion for solving complex problems and uncovering actionable insights through data analysis. Experienced in advanced calculus, statistical modeling, and research, with a proven ability to deliver impactful results in academic and professional settings. Skilled in leveraging technical tools like MATLAB and Python to craft innovative solutions to challenging problems. Excited to contribute to collaborative, data-driven environments where analytical expertise drives organizational success and growth.


Skillset includes:



Expert Microsoft Excel and data management user


Research and Data Analysis


Statistics and Probability


MATLAB and Python


Fundamentals of Advanced Calculus


R Script for Statistical Computing



Education


Boston University, Boston, MA Master of Science, Applied Business Analytics, December 2026


Southern New Hampshire University, Manchester, NH Bachelor of Science, Mathematics, October 2024 Relevant coursework: Applied Statistics for STEM, Mathematical Modeling, Abstract Algebra, Seminar in Applied Mathematics, Financial Accounting, Applied Statistics 2 STEM


University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill, Chapel Hill, NC Bachelor of Arts, History, December 2023 Relevant coursework: Discrete Math, 1st Course in Diff Equations, Advanced Calculus 1, Undergraduate Seminar in History, The Global Cold War, The World Since 1945, Linear Algebra, History of Sea Power, Intro to Probability, Topics in Mathematics, Air Power, Functions of a Complex Variable with Applications, Medieval History. Dean’s List 2023


Durham Technical Community College, Durham, NC Associates, Engineering, May 2020 Relevant coursework: Intro to Engineering, Engineering Graphics, General Physics 1, General Physics 2


Professional Experience


Independent Tutor Middle/High School Mathematics Tutor      2020 – Present



Provide comprehensive tutoring services to students across various levels, from Pre-Algebra to Precalculus, fostering confidence and academic excellence.


Design tailored learning strategies to address individual needs, improving understanding of challenging concepts and driving measurable progress in performance.


Utilize clear communication and problem-solving approaches to demystify complex mathematical principles for diverse learning styles.



Hotel Westport, Westport, Ireland      Summers 2015 – 2022 Leisure, Spa, and Hotel / Conference & Banqueting / Seasonal Employee



Served a key role in delivering exceptional guest experience for customers during peak summer periods, ensuring high standards of service.


Collaborated with the Activities Supervisor to plan and execute engaging events that enhanced guest satisfaction.


Demonstrated adaptability and strong interpersonal skills by seamlessly integrating into dynamic teams in a fast-paced hospitality environment.



Other Information


Travel: US and Europe Sports: Long-distance runner and active CrossFit member Hobbies: Avid comic collector and puzzle/logic game enthusiast, showcasing creativity and critical thinking

title: Welcome to Ryan Martin’s Personal Portfolio
text:
Welcome to Ryan Martin’s Personal Portfolio





This website showcases my background, school achievements, and projects. Feel free to explore the different sections to learn more about me, view my resume, and get in touch.

title: Backround and Interests
text:
I was born and raised in Chapel Hill, North Carolina. and come fromy a family of six. My mother is from Ireland, and my father is from South Africa. I have one brother and two sisters - my brother and sister are from England, and my other sister is also from Chapel Hill.
I am a highly motivated and detail-oriented mathematics graduate with a passion for solving complex problems and uncovering actionable insights through data analysis. My background includes advanced calculus, statistical modeling, and research, where I have consistently delivered impactful results in both academic and professional settings.
I am skilled in leveraging technical tools such as MATLAB and Python to craft innovative solutions to challenging problems. My expertise extends to Microsoft Excel, research and data analysis, statistics and probability, and R scripting for statistical computing.
Currently, I am pursuing a Master of Science in Applied Business Analytics at Boston University, building on my Bachelor of Science in Mathematics from Southern New Hampshire University and a Bachelor of Arts in History from the University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill.

title: Backround and Interests
text:
Career Goals
I am excited to contribute to collaborative, data-driven environments where my analytical expertise can drive organizational success and growth. My goal is to apply my skills in mathematics and data analytics to solve real-world problems and support decision-making processes.

title: Backround and Interests
text:
Interests
Outside of my professional pursuits, I am an avid long-distance runner and active CrossFit member. I enjoy collecting comics and engaging in puzzle and logic games, which reflect my creativity and critical thinking skills.
Feel free to explore the other sections of my portfolio to learn more about my projects, achievements, and how to get in touch.
